${ModID}:Allseer.NAME: Allseer
${ModID}:Allseer.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.{@@}{!${ModID}:I!|1= NL ${ModID}:Mind-Meld.|2= NL ${ModID}:Close_Encounter.}

${ModID}:Amphare.NAME: Amphare
${ModID}:Amphare.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} .

${ModID}:Bansheep.NAME: Bansheep
${ModID}:Bansheep.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage{@@}{!M!|>0= !M! times. NL Ignores Block}.{!${ModID}:I!|>0= NL If this would deal !${ModID}:M2! or less unblocked damage, raise it to !${ModID}:I!.}

${ModID}:Braxsuit.NAME: Braxsuit
${ModID}:Braxsuit.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Dexterity.

${ModID}:Bulletino.NAME: Bulletino
${ModID}:Bulletino.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!${ModID}:I!|0,1=Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards.|2=Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL Draw !M! cards for each enemy hit.|3=Draw !M! cards. NL Deal !D! damage for each card drawn during this turn.}{!${ModID}:I!|0= NL Exhaust.}{!${ModID}:Gearyu!|1= NL (Hits !${ModID}:M2! time.)|2= NL (Hits !${ModID}:M2! times.)}

${ModID}:Camping.NAME: Camping
${ModID}:Camping.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.
${ModID}:Camping.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

${ModID}:Candevil.NAME: Candevil
${ModID}:Candevil.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block.{@@}{!${ModID}:I!|1= NL Apply !M! Poison.|2= NL Startup: Gain !M! Block.}

${ModID}:Carniviper.NAME: Carniviper
${ModID}:Carniviper.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!${ModID}:I!|0=Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison.|1=Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL Draw 2 cards.|2=Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply !M! Poison twice.|3=Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL When you draw this card, ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Poison.}

${ModID}:Clocksley.NAME: Clocksley
${ModID}:Clocksley.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:Diveal.NAME: Diveal
${ModID}:Diveal.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage{@@}{!M!|>0= and apply !M! ${ModID}:Tape_Jam} to the last enemy that attacked you.

${ModID}:Dominoth.NAME: Dominoth
${ModID}:Dominoth.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!${ModID}:I!|1=Apply !M! ${ModID}:Conductive. NL }Draw !M! cards. NL {!${ModID}:I!|2=Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your hand. NL }Discard 1 card.{!${ModID}:Tokusect!|1= NL (Deals !D! damage.)}

${ModID}:Jellyton.NAME: Jellyton
${ModID}:Jellyton.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Perfect. NL Whenever you are attacked, apply !M! Poison back.

${ModID}:Kittelly.NAME: Kittelly
${ModID}:Kittelly.DESCRIPTION: Replace this card with a copy of the last card played this combat. NL It costs 0 this turn.

${ModID}:Macabra.NAME: Macabra
${ModID}:Macabra.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Thorns. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Thorns.

${ModID}:Magikrab.NAME: Magikrab
${ModID}:Magikrab.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Perfect. NL Gain 1 Intangible. NL Gain 2 Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:MissMimic.NAME: Miss Mimic
${ModID}:MissMimic.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Perfect. NL Deal double damage and gain double Block for !M! turns. NL When this effect expires, die.

${ModID}:Muskrateer.NAME: Muskrateer
${ModID}:Muskrateer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have played less than !M! cards this turn, draw 1 card.

${ModID}:Salamagus.NAME: Salamagus
${ModID}:Salamagus.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, apply !M! ${ModID}:Burned to a random enemy.{@@}{!${ModID}:I!|1= NL ${ModID}:Mind-Meld.}

${ModID}:Sanzatime.NAME: Sanzatime
${ModID}:Sanzatime.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase all of the enemy's debuffs by !M!.

${ModID}:Sirenade.NAME: Sirenade
${ModID}:Sirenade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Multitarget.

${ModID}:Springheel.NAME: Springheel
${ModID}:Springheel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak.{@@}{!${ModID}:I!|0=|1= NL Next turn, gain [E] .|2= NL Next turn, gain [E] [E] .}

${ModID}:Squirey.NAME: Squirey
${ModID}:Squirey.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!${ModID}:I!|1=Gain !B! Block. NL }Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Traffikrab.NAME: Traffikrab
${ModID}:Traffikrab.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn draw !M! additional card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Undyin.NAME: Undyin
${ModID}:Undyin.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Perfect. NL At the end of combat, or when you would die, heal !M! HP.
